A new walk-through coronavirus testing site has opened at Rochdale Town Hall car park.
The facility - one of only three of its type in the country - is for residents who are displaying Covid-19 symp… [+2960 chars]

articles.title: The coronavirus divide: Why five groups are dying more than they should - Sky News
